text:
:) 
This update, from some reports across different forums appears to be like a
tornado whose sole destination is the mobile home park. 
Still trying to imagine how MSFT could even conceive or expects consumers, SMB
and even Enterprise to use those instructions to BYO(build your own) WinRE
partition. 
Wondering if this is a by product of the June 2023 inclusion of WinRE in Windows
updates?? 
…w

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
